summary: An armor created mostly for testing and to gain feedback about it before I add it to Call of the North Revisited.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb445/FoxyFoxia/StormcloakBattleArmor_zps68a49710.png[/img][/center]

[center][youtube]c-Hmh1uFMIk[/youtube][/center]

Update: Permissions have been changed to give people freedom to work on there own changes and fixes to this mod because I do not plan to be working on it anymore.

Version 2.0 is out with female armors incorporated into it!

Females and males both have a skirted version and pants+sleeves version now. Original non sleeved version has been removed.

The new female armor is 100% UNP made from Exeters UNP meshes. I will absolutely not make any version for any other Body mods or vanilla armor. So do not ask for me to support (Place body mod here) for you. It is not happening.

now onto fixes
Armor has been removed from Daedric section and instead placed in the iron section.
The Gauntlets have been fixed to be heavy armor with a slight change in weight and the armors rating.

Also due to some other clipping issues with the claws on the bear cloak, the claws have been removed from it.


========

[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZYFzS28Xx78[/youtube][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sX6Bc7UpO5A[/youtube]

Thanks to:
Guardian300: For original bear helm mesh
Foxia: For the armor itself
Exeter: For giving people free use to use his UNP meshes.
Dimon99: For creating the wonderful UNP body.
author: Foxia

files.name: Stormcloak Battle Armor v20
files.changelogHtml:
Added female armors
Fixed it so it isn't located in the daedric section of the forge. It will now be found in the iron section.
The Gauntlets have been fixed so they are not considered light armor anymore. They will now be considered heavy armor.
